value.title: 5 AWESOME things about the new ribbon in Power BI Desktop

value.title: Best kept SECRET in Power BI??? You tell us!
value.excerpt: Have we found the best kept SECRET in Power BI? Adam saw this recently and was BLOWN away! Zooming in can help with presenting in business settings and anywhere else. Here are a few things you can use to make that presentation better with Power BI.  ZoomIt:  https://docs.microsoft.com/sysinternals/downloads/zoomit

value.title: Best Practice Analyzer in Tabular Editor for your Power BI Dataset
value.excerpt: Do you work on your Power BI dataset or data model? Are you following best practices? Patrick walks you through a best practice analyzer set for Tabular Editor, from Michael Kolvasky, that can help you improve your data model.  Blog post: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/blog/best-practice-rules-to-improve-your-models-performance/

value.title: Brand your Report Server
value.excerpt: I break down how to make a branding package for SQL Server Reporting Services 2016. I compare it from the original skin, to the multicolor brand package that Chris Finlan put together, to my custom brand package for Guy in a Cube. value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground

value.title: How to use the Power BI Aggregations Feature
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam sits down with Christian Wade to discuss how to use the Power BI Aggregations feature. This video will show you the clicks to get to the clicky clicky draggy droppy awesomeness when working with big data, or even massive data.   Christian Wade on Twitter - @_christianWade  LET'S CONNECT!

value.excerpt: At Microsoft Ignite, we found out about Power BI Premium Gen2. It's now available for you to use and WOW! It has changed the game! Adam walks you through what the changes are to help you level up.  Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-what-is#power-bi-premium-generation-2-preview

value.title: Power BI Drillthrough Updates
value.excerpt: Did you know there were Power BI drillthrough updates? In this video, Patrick looks at the drillthrough updates in Power BI Desktop.
